attributes.action: reinstate the Treason Act as it stood before abolition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is another petition, (expiring 21 January 2010), calling for the reinstatement of the Treason Act, but with amendments. It needs to be reinstated in its original form before any amendments are considered.
Probably the most well known case in modern History where an individual was convicted of Treason was William Joyce 1906-1946, known as Lord Haw-Haw, a Briton who was a broadcaster of Nazi propadanda during World War II. He was rightly executed for treason.
